item.title: Seeing More of Jesus Christ in Our Lives
item.description:
Seeing More of Jesus Christ in Our Lives by Sister Tracy Y. Browning, Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency given in Saturday Morning of 192nd Semiannual General Conference on Fri Sep 30 2022
This meta-podcast is not published, maintained, or endorsed by The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-Day Saints, but instead by a faithful member of the Church who is seeking ways to make consuming Gospel content easier for everyone. If there are any mistakes, please report them on GitHub and we'll try to get them fixed.
item.itunes:author: Sister Tracy Y. Browning, Second Counselor in the Primary General Presidency
